name: BLACK SQUAD (itch)
description:
WHAT IS THIS GAME?                                                                                                                                                This is a multiplayer action game. where you can play with your friends. You can do whatever you want to do in this game.

WHAT CAN WE FIND?                                                                                                                                   There are 4 different maps:

1-Forrest

2-Hanger

3-Mansion

4-Warehouse

There are 4 guns:

1-SMG

2-Sniper

3-Knife

4-Pistol

5-Grenade

6-Molotov Cocktail

7-Shotgun

Controls:

Move forward:   W

Move backward:   S

Move right:   D

Move left:   A

Reload:   R

Crouch:   C

Jump:   Space

Shot:   Left-click

Aim:   Right-click

Swap weapon:   1,2,3

What teams are there in the game?

You can select 2 teams: 

1-Delta

2-Recon  

HOW MANY GAME MODES ARE THERE?

1- Team deathmatch

2- Domination

3- Flag

I hope you will enjoy my game see you in the next game.

CREDITS:
